column2: Ticinum, The Roman City, has captured by Lombards after a long-time siege. The city has become the capital of Lombard Kingdom, and also renamed to 'Pavia'.
There is no concern of us
Narses, Roman Eunuch and Great General, died in $YEAR$. He had finished the Gothic War, and became the first Praetorian Prefect of Italy.
He will be remembered as a great person.
We had settled in northern Italy, but the fortress of Ticinum isn't fallen. We should capture the fort, and make it our capital.
We should secure the land of Campania and Samnium. Many People need for more land. We recruited many warriors, and waiting for your decision.
After our successful invasion, Duke [Root.GetName] gained Duchy of Benevento.
After the Conquest of Pavia, all lords of the realm came up and holding a feast.
Rosamund is wife of Alboin, but he executed her father and took her. she didn't forget it, and time is come.
Cleph had assasinated. after the death of Cleph, Lombard lords refused to elect new king.
Lombard Kingdom is re-established. our new king is ready for your loyalty.
You have declared a campaign against Roman Empire. but Warriors had waited for a long-time. They are angry because you had broke the promise.

Ravenna was the political capital of Italy from 402. Later that city become the capital of Exarchate of Ravenna. but the prosperous era is about to end. Lombard army entered the city, and the last Exarch ran away. the Exarchate is no more.

Western Roman Empire had fallen in 476 by Odoacer. After that, Rome has ruled by barbarians. Justinian Reconquest on Italy restored Roman rule, In 568, However, Lombard barbarians invaded Italy. [Root.GetName] expelled all barbarians, and United Italy under your authority. By Now, Western Roman Empire will reborn.. and restore all its former Territory.

Western Empire has restored, by [Root.GetName]. Western Roman Empire had fallen in 476 by Odoacer. After that, Rome has ruled by barbarians. Justinian Reconquest on Italy restored Roman rule, In 568, However, Lombard barbarians invaded Italy. [Root.GetName] expelled all barbarians, and United Italy under your authority. By Now, Western Roman Empire will reborn.. and restore all its former Territory.
Maurikios was born in Arabissos, Cappadocia. He became a brilliant general, and nominated as emperor.
Bahram was great general of the Empire. TODO
You should not wait more that Tyrant Phokas ruins our empire. You revolted with African Army, to destroy Phokas.
Phokas became new emperor of Romans. he killed your benefactor Maurikios and his family. You declares revenge.
Khadijah is a wealthy trader. Muhammad fell in love with her. their age gap is too big, though. With this marriage Muhammad will become wealthy thanks to her wife.
Life is good, but why we lives? It is a great problem. You wants to go a journey.
Muhammad has founded new monothiestic religion, called 'Islam'. Could You follow this new movement?
Aisha is daughter of My Friend, Abu Bakr. She is just a kid, but we can marry...
Persecuation towards Islam is more stronger and stronger. Tribes in Yathrib called us for settle their disputes.
I think this is a great chance...
Persecuation towards Islam is more stronger and stronger. Tribes in Yathrib called Muhammad for arbitration. In $YEAR$, Muhammad and his followers had left Mecca, and settled in Yathrib, now Medina.
Muhammad conquered Mecca. The Prophet Muhammad destructed statues of Arabian Gods in Kaaba, and declared it as the holy site of Islam.
Now The Prophet has gone to Allah

Gupta Empire was once most powerful realm in the world. But after death of Kumaragupta, The Empire suffered Huna Invasion from central asia. India has successfully expelled out them, but local powers has arised, and Guptas were replaced by Later Gupta Dynasty. Later Guptas ruled old Gupta core region. but their rule also goes to end. Gupta Empire -- is over. Later Guptas became a small kingdom of Magagha. and all vassals became independent.
New emperor took power- me, as roman independent governor, swear to empire.
The Exarchate of Ravenna has dismantled.
